00032 #define CATCH_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_IN_RECEIVER_1 \
00033 catch( const sc_report& x ) \
00034 { \
00035  std::cout << x.what() << std::endl; \
00036   report_tlm1_error(rec); \
00037   return 0; \
00038 } \
00039 catch( const ::std::exception& x ) \
00040 { \
00041   std::cout << x.what() << std::endl; \
00042   report_tlm1_error(rec); \
00043   return 0; \
00044 } \
00045 catch( const char* s ) \
00046 { \
00047   ::std::cout << "\n" << s << ::std::endl; \
00048   report_tlm1_error(rec); \
00049   return 0; \
00050 } \

00052 { \
00053   ::std::cout << "\n" << "UNKNOWN EXCEPTION OCCURED" << ::std::endl; \

00055   return 0; \
